dataRoles.name: category
dataRoles.description: Field to place on Horizontal or Vertical Axis

dataRoles.name: breakdown
dataRoles.description: Explore change between categories based on this field

key.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://xviz.com

dashColor.description: Color of the line connecting the data points

dashStyle.description: Style of the line connecting the data points

dashWidth.description: Width of the line connecting the data points

fontfamily.description: Applied to all the text in the visual

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

isContextMenu.description: Right Click to visualize Context Menu

isFinalBalance.description: On enabling this,  sum of all values will be displayed.

varianceProperty.description: Chosen format will be shown in deviation bar.

fontColor.description: Font Color of the Axis Title and Labels

innerPadding.description: Pad the Space Between Data points

maxLabelHeight.description: The maximum height of the axis labels as a % of plot area. The value can range between 15-50%.

maxLabelWidth.description: The maximum width of the axis label

prependAllCategories.description: Enabling this will prepend all the categories in the hierarchy.

xAxisLabel.description: Select the interval on which you want to see the X Axis Labels

xAxisReverse.description: Displays axis labels in reverse order.

xAxisposition.description: Set the position of X axis

axisBreakScaling.description: Y axis scaling for better viewing of the variance values

isAxisBreak.description: Shrink the large segments to enhance readability for the smaller segments

noOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

yAxisAutoScale.description: The scaling of the Y Axis is determined by the values from the data. Turn off to set the Scaling manually.

yAxisAutoScaling.description: This will increase minimum value in the Y Axis.

yAxisShownthLabel.description: Select the interval on which you want to see the Y Axis Labels

yAxisposition.description: Set the position of Y axis

yaxisreverse.description: Displays axis labels in reverse order.

gradientColor.description: Use gradient colors on axis break

dlOverlap.description: The overlapping data labels are hidden. Switch on to show overlapping data labels.

dlXOffset.description: Y axis offset Value to better positioning of data labels

dlYOffset.description: Y axis offset Value to better positioning of data labels

noOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

dlNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

negativeValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Negative values

noOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

positiveValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Positive values

semanticFormatting.description: Colors for underlying Data Format Types

variance.description: To set the title for Variance

varianceDecimalPlaces.description: This will be applied to the values shown in datalabel

variancePercentage.description: To set the title for the Variance Percentage

varianceScalingDisplay.description: This will scale the value which is displayed in datalabel

enablertl.description: Choose to have the Values on the Legend displayed from right to Left

hposition.description: Select the horizontal location for the legend

vposition.description: Select the vertical location for the legend

dragSelectionAction.description: Lasso and inverse lasso section options for category members

lasso.description: Selecting multiple values in the data series to perform filtering action based on selection

reverselasso.description: Same as Lasso option except that the reverse lasso excludes data points selected
